m_szDocTitle: Hydrogen Powered Mercedes GLC In The Works - Geeky Gadgets
m_szDocSumamry: Geeky Gadgets Hydrogen Powered Mercedes GLC In The Works 1:14 pm By Roland Hutchinson The new Mercedes GLC launched last September, the car is available in both diesel and petrol engines and now there is a new Hydrogen powered version on the way. According to a recent report, a Mercedes GLC with a Hydrogen fuel cell will launch next year, this was recently confirmed by the company’s R&D boss, Dr Thomas Weber at the Detroit motor show. “We are in the middle of the car’s roll-out phase right now,” Weber revealed. The hardware required to generate electric power from hydrogen has been significant
